description: Snow Day Assistant uses WeatherBug's Pulse API to figure out the amount of snow accumulation in the next day and based off that, determines how likely you are to have school the next day. Works only for Ashburn, VA.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Snow Day Assistant what are the chances of school tomorrow?
Alexa, ask Snow Day Assistant chances of school tomorrow?
Alexa, ask Snow Day Assistant what are the chances of a snow day tomorrow
name: Snow Day Assistant
shortDescription: Ask Alexa how likely you are to have a snow day tomorrow
